activities: Mega Group Online is a consumer reporting agency who conducts background checks for the purpose of employment, tenancy, or credential verification. Types of information that may be received from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland include employment verifications, education verifications, reference interviews, civil background checks, and criminal background checks.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Types of data collected include name, Social Security Number, National ID Number, Passport Number, date of birth, address history, and other personal identifiers. Some, not all, of our data is manually processed.
privacyprograms: Mega Group Online is currently not a member of any privacy organizations for Safe Harbor purposes.
recoursemech: Should there be any complaints or disputes against Mega Group Online we encourage the consumer to contact Mega Group Online directly. Further, should MGO be unable to satisfy a consumer’s concern, we will collaborate and cooperate with the European Data Protection Authorities (DPA) & Swiss FDPIC to investigate and attempt to resolve any complaints and disputes regarding the use and disclosure of personal information in accordance with the U.S.-E.U. and U.S.-Swiss Safe Harbor Principles.
